participant_1.background:
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
i work at a bookstore.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
I learned how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students.
my wife has terminal cancer.

participant_2.background:
I wonder what kind of treasures I will find on my next walk in the woods.
i hate my parents , but i love my job.
I began whittling and traveling the country in my car.
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
I love eating McDonald's french fries, but I never tell my parents because they think they are unhealthy.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well! I'm so excited for the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to be taking a walk in the woods with my cats. What are you doing?
That sounds fun! I'm not sure yet. I might go to the bookstore or spend time organizing my office supplies.
I love bookstores! I work at one. What kind of books do you like?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's cool! I like to read a lot of biographies.
Oh, I love biographies too! I just finished reading one about Abraham Lincoln.
That's one of my favorites! I also love the biographies of Winston Churchill and Nelson Mandela.
I've been meaning to read the ones about them! I'm also a big fan of historical fiction.
Oh, that's awesome! What are some of your favorite books?
I really like the "Outlander" series by Diana Gabaldon. It's about a woman who travels back in time to the 18th century.
I've heard good things about that series! I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's really good.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
